{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3483424,"name":"Nicholas Armstrong","username":"narmstro","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/5e9695/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-15T15:51:12.896Z","cooked":"

Is there a way to switch IdleMode from coast to brake as the motor is running in the new config?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2025-01-15T15:51:12.896Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":162,"reads":96,"readers_count":95,"score":829.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":481897,"topic_slug":"rev-sparkmax-flex-setting-changing-idle-mode-when-active","display_username":"Nicholas Armstrong","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/rev-robotics-2024-2025/471083/265","internal":true,"reflection":true,"title":"REV Robotics 2024 / 2025","clicks":1}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":48345,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/rev-sparkmax-flex-setting-changing-idle-mode-when-active/481897/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3483470,"name":"Dave Oleksy","username":"doleksy","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/7ab992/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-15T16:31:28.325Z","cooked":"

In C++:

SparkFlexConfig config;

config.SetIdleMode(SparkFlexConfig::IdleMode::kCoast);
m_sparkFlex.Configure(
    config,
    SparkFlex::ResetMode::kNoResetSafeParameters,
    SparkFlex::PersistMode::kPersistParameters);

Java will be similar.
The key is SparkFlex::ResetMode::kNoResetSafeParameters to keep the other parameters as they are.

doleksy:

config

That’s kind of what I was thinking. While I understand having IdleMode as a preconfig its sort of a regression if you wish to use it in commands.
